channel.title: Need Help With 508 Webclient
channel.description:
oke so i started making a 508 webclient but everytime i load my page i get a error
Java Plug-in 1.6.0_20 Using JRE version 1.6.0_20-b02 Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM User home directory = C:\Users\ri ---------------------------------------------------- c: clear console window f: finalize objects on finalization queue g: garbage collect h: display this help message l: dump classloader list m: print memory usage o: trigger logging q: hide console r: reload policy configuration s: dump system and deployment properties t: dump thread list v: dump thread stack x: clear classloader cache 0-5: set trace level to <n> ----------------------------------------------------
load: class loader.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: \localhost\C:\Users\ri\Desktop\webclient\loader\loader\class.class (The filename, directory name, or volume label syntax is incorrect) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: loader.class
what is this prob lem? and how can i fix it did i do something wrong wit jar maker? This is the tutariol i followd on how to make it with jar maker http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzi0oEixxvQ
THANKS FOR READING THIS ALSO FOR THE PERSON THAT CAN HELP ME OUT I'M WILLING TO GIVE 3 DOLLARS THAT ON MY PAYPAL ACC AND A RUNESCAPE ACC OF LEVEL 59 MAGE ITS NOT MUCH BUT ITS ALL THAT I HAVE ALSO HE CAN BE A CO OWNER ON MY 24/7 SERVER THEN

item.title: Need Help With 508 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

well tell yourfriends this get winrar, tell them to google it. Then tell them to click the download client button on your site. tell them wait for winrar to open they will see a file that says(your clients name) tell them to click and hold the file, then drag the folder to there desktop. It is very simple

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With 508 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @rain1994 rain1994
item.description:
@rain1994 wrote:

If you do make a 508+ webclient Jagex will close it down faster than a cheetah on speed. You should defenitly make a client. Don’t make a 508+ webclient if your going to make a webclient make a 317. Hope i helped you and goodluck

Read full topic
